admin.TransitionTime: Speed of transitions between slides (default is 5 seconds)
admin.TransitionTime-help: Put a number that indicates the transitions time (in seconds) between each slide
admin.TitleSlide1-help: Set here the title of your first slide
admin.TextSlide1-help: Set here the text for your first slide
admin.BtnSlide1-help: Set here the text for your first slide button
admin.LinkOne-help: Enter a valid url for the first slide button
admin.ImageOne-help: Set a valid URL to your first image in the slideshow
admin.TitleSlide2-help: Set here the title of your second slide
admin.TextSlide2-help: Set here the text for your second slide
admin.BtnSlide2-help: Set here the text for your second slide button
admin.LinkTwo-help: Enter a valid url for the second slide button
admin.ImageTwo-help: Set a valid URL to your second image in the slideshow
admin.TitleSlide3-help: Set here the title of your third slide
admin.TextSlide3-help: Set here the text for your third slide
admin.BtnSlide3-help: Set here the text for your third slide button
admin.LinkThree-help: Enter a valid url for the third slide button
admin.ImageThree-help: Set a valid URL to your third image in the slideshow
